h1: How Many Calories in a Cup of Black Coffee?

disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bean type, brew strength, and serving size. Check labels on packaged coffee when available.

quick_answer.text: A cup of black coffee contains just 2 calories, making it a virtually calorie-free beverage.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Espresso shot (1 oz) instead of full cup

faqs.q: How many calories are in a cup of coffee black?
faqs.a: Only about 2 calories per 8 oz cup.

faqs.q: Does black coffee have any carbs or protein?
faqs.a: Negligible—0 g carbs and 0.1 g protein per cup.

faqs.q: Is black coffee caffeine-free in terms of calories?
faqs.a: Caffeine doesn't add calories; the 2 kcal come from trace compounds in the brew.

faqs.q: How does brew method affect calories in black coffee?
faqs.a: Minimal impact; all black brews are under 5 kcal per cup regardless of method.

faqs.q: What if I add cream to my black coffee?
faqs.a: 1 tbsp heavy cream adds ~50 kcal, turning it into 52 kcal total.
